item.title: Zybooks
item.description: I was going to write a long rant about how much i despise north american math textbooks but I’ll leave that for later. I’ll just say that if I had studied math using these books I’d probably never have decided to pursue it as a career. I’m very glad that one of the casualties of this pandemic is going to be the calculus textbook (and its siblings). While planning for this course I came across several online textbooks that I plan to explore in detail sometime.
